name: Viral Load Request
sql:
/*
   * Name:Viral Load Request
   * Query Type: SQL Cohort Query
   * Description: Patients with new Lab Orders
   */

  SELECT person_id
  FROM obs
  WHERE
    date(date_created) >= date(:lastExecutionTime)
  AND (concept_id = :CIEL_162078 AND value_datetime IS NOT NULL)
  AND not voided;
